content:
BasicHttpRelayBindingElement BasicHttpRelayBindingElement Class

In this Article

Edit

Represents a configuration element that specifies a binding used to communicate with WS-I Basic Profile 1.1-conformant Web Services like ASMX-based services or to accept messages from ASMX-based clients through the Azure Service Bus.

Syntax

Declaration

public class BasicHttpRelayBindingElement : StandardBindingElement, IBindingConfigurationElement, IConfigurationContextProviderInternalPublic Class BasicHttpRelayBindingElement
    Inherits StandardBindingElement
    Implements IBindingConfigurationElement, IConfigurationContextProviderInternal

BasicHttpRelayBindingElement(String)

Properties summary

AllowCookies
AllowCookies

Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the client accepts cookies and propagates them on future requests.
BindingElementType
BindingElementType

Gets the type of this binding element.
IsDynamic
IsDynamic

Gets or sets whether the binding element is dynamic.
MaxBufferPoolSize
MaxBufferPoolSize

Gets or sets the maximum size for a buffer pool that stores messages processed by the binding.
MaxBufferSize
MaxBufferSize

Gets or sets the maximum size of a buffer that stores messages while they are processed for an endpoint configured with this binding.
MaxReceivedMessageSize
MaxReceivedMessageSize

Gets or sets the maximum message size, in bytes, including headers, for a message that can be received on a channel configured with this binding.
MessageEncoding
MessageEncoding

Gets or sets the messaging encoding that indicates whether MTOM or text/XML is used to encode the SOAP message.
Properties
Properties

Gets a collection of objects that can be attributes or configuration element objects of this binding configuration element.
ProxyAddress
ProxyAddress

Gets or sets the URI that describes the address of the HTTP proxy.
ReaderQuotas
ReaderQuotas

Gets or sets an XML value that places constraints on the complexity of SOAP messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding.
Security
Security

Gets the type of security to be used for the binding.
TextEncoding
TextEncoding

Gets or sets the character set encoding to be used for emitting messages on the binding.
TransferMode
TransferMode

Gets or sets whether messages are buffered or streamed on a request or response.
UseDefaultWebProxy
UseDefaultWebProxy

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the auto-configured HTTP proxy of the system should be used, if available.

    AllowCookies
    AllowCookies

    Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the client accepts cookies and propagates them on future requests.

    [ConfigurationProperty("allowCookies", DefaultValue = false)]
public bool AllowCookies { get; set; }<ConfigurationProperty("allowCookies", DefaultValue:=False)>
Public Property AllowCookies As Boolean

    Property Value

    • Boolean
      Boolean

      true if the client accepts cookies and propagates them on future requests; otherwise, false. The default value is false.

    IsDynamic

    Gets or sets whether the binding element is dynamic.

    [ConfigurationProperty("isDynamic", DefaultValue = true)]

Public Property IsDynamic As Boolean

      Boolean

      true if the binding element is dynamic; otherwise, false.

  • Edit
    MaxBufferPoolSize
    MaxBufferPoolSize

    Gets or sets the maximum size for a buffer pool that stores messages processed by the binding.

    [ConfigurationProperty("maxBufferPoolSize", DefaultValue = 524288L)]
[LongValidator(MinValue = 0L)]
public long MaxBufferPoolSize { get; set; }<ConfigurationProperty("maxBufferPoolSize", DefaultValue:=524288L)>
<LongValidator(MinValue:=0L)>
Public Property MaxBufferPoolSize As Long

    Property Value

    • Int64
      Int64

      Returns an Int64 that contains the buffer pool size. The default value is 512*1024 bytes. The minimum value is 0.

  • Edit
    MaxBufferSize
    MaxBufferSize

    Gets or sets the maximum size of a buffer that stores messages while they are processed for an endpoint configured with this binding.

    [ConfigurationProperty("maxBufferSize", DefaultValue = 65536)]
[IntegerValidator(MinValue = 1)]
public int MaxBufferSize { get; set; }<ConfigurationProperty("maxBufferSize", DefaultValue:=65536)>
<IntegerValidator(MinValue:=1)>
Public Property MaxBufferSize As Integer

    Property Value

    • Int32
      Int32

      Returns the maximum buffer size. The default value is 65,536 bytes. The minimum value is 1 byte.

  • Edit
    MaxReceivedMessageSize
    MaxReceivedMessageSize

    Gets or sets the maximum message size, in bytes, including headers, for a message that can be received on a channel configured with this binding.

    [ConfigurationProperty("maxReceivedMessageSize", DefaultValue = 65536L)]
[LongValidator(MinValue = 1L)]
public long MaxReceivedMessageSize { get; set; }<ConfigurationProperty("maxReceivedMessageSize", DefaultValue:=65536L)>
<LongValidator(MinValue:=1L)>
Public Property MaxReceivedMessageSize As Long

    Property Value

    • Int64
      Int64

      The maximum received message size. The default value is 65,536 bytes. The minimum value is 1 byte.

    MessageEncoding
    MessageEncoding

    Gets or sets the messaging encoding that indicates whether MTOM or text/XML is used to encode the SOAP message.

    [ConfigurationProperty("messageEncoding", DefaultValue = WSMessageEncoding.Text)]
public WSMessageEncoding MessageEncoding { get; set; }<ConfigurationProperty("messageEncoding", DefaultValue:=WSMessageEncoding.Text)>
Public Property MessageEncoding As WSMessageEncoding

    Property Value

    • WSMessageEncoding
      WSMessageEncoding

      Returns a WSMessageEncoding that contains either Text/XML or MTOM. The default value is Text.

Public ReadOnly Property Security As BasicHttpRelaySecurityElement

      BasicHttpRelaySecurityElement

      Returns a BasicHttpRelaySecurityElement that specifies the type of security to be used with the binding. The default value is None.

    TextEncoding
    TextEncoding

    Gets or sets the character set encoding to be used for emitting messages on the binding.

    [ConfigurationProperty("textEncoding", DefaultValue = "utf-8")]
[TypeConverter(typeof (EncodingConverter))]
public Encoding TextEncoding { get; set; }<ConfigurationProperty("textEncoding", DefaultValue:="utf-8")>
<TypeConverter(GetType(EncodingConverter))>
Public Property TextEncoding As Encoding

    Property Value

    • Encoding
      Encoding

      Returns a Encoding that contains the text encoding. The default value is UTF8.

Public Property TransferMode As TransferMode

    Property Value

    • TransferMode
      TransferMode

      Returns a TransferMode that contains the transfer mode. The default value is TransferMode.Buffered.

    [ConfigurationProperty("useDefaultWebProxy", DefaultValue = true)]

Public Property UseDefaultWebProxy As Boolean

    Property Value

    • Boolean
      Boolean

      true to use the http proxy; otherwise, false. The default value is true.
